anathema: Fail to study a new creature if safely able, force a creature to live in the wrong body, reject creatures or information due to bigoted or rigid beliefs
edict: Create without reservation, help others unlock their true potential, observe the mysteries of life
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Aakriti (The Evershifting)](/Deities.aspx?ID=623)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>

</traits>

**Source** [Divine Mysteries Web Supplement](/Sources.aspx?ID=237) pg. 3

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Other Gods](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=2)

**Edicts** Create without reservation, help others unlock their true potential, observe the mysteries of life

**Anathema** Fail to study a new creature if safely able, force a creature to live in the wrong body, reject creatures or information due to bigoted or rigid beliefs

**Area of Concern**
Discovery, life, ooze, potential

**Pantheons**
[Wheels Of Innovation](/Deities.aspx?ID=385)

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Attribute](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Constitution or Charisma

**Divine Font** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146) or [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Sanctification** none

**Divine Skill** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=34)

**Favored Weapon** [Whip](/Weapons.aspx?ID=404)

**Domains** [Change](/Domains.aspx?ID=102), [Creation](/Domains.aspx?ID=68), [Fate](/Domains.aspx?ID=75), [Time](/Domains.aspx?ID=121)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** [Freedom](/Domains.aspx?ID=77), [Knowledge](/Domains.aspx?ID=80)

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Ant Haul](/Spells.aspx?ID=1442)

- **3rd**
[Insect Form](/Spells.aspx?ID=1575)

- **9th**
[Metamorphosis](/Spells.aspx?ID=1599)

</column>
name: Aakriti (The Evershifting)
